description: Used to compose a group of inputs, buttons and input indicators into a single component.

props.name: indicatorStyle
props.description: The style of input indicators to use, either internal where the indicator is inside the adjoined input field or external where the indicator is external to the adjoining field separated by a border & not highlighted as part of the field.

props.name: color
props.description: The border highlight color when the indicator style is internal.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Use the disabled color styles when the indicator style is internal.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The slot for the inputs, buttons and input indicators to compose into a single component
